bd6a1680-c596-4bc0-a023-473ec93aedb7.name: 按“执行任务所必须”的标准可以获知相对狭窄范围的机密

2085fa4e-5b56-4ada-8101-83448173f56c.name: 狭窄范围内的机密可以自由获知

464723f2-5634-4c72-adb4-15e8fc31ef45.name: 按“执行任务所必须”的标准可以获知宽泛范围的机密

25ded39b-8d13-4c4a-a936-1b4499bc08df.name: 可以自由获知宽广范围内的机密

32b790c6-5df1-4bb4-9993-5c25959b7c8f.name: 幸运
32b790c6-5df1-4bb4-9993-5c25959b7c8f.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

75884b8d-349f-46fd-b8bf-b425e83da0ea.name: 健康
75884b8d-349f-46fd-b8bf-b425e83da0ea.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

e5b68a5c-0c04-4dd1-9deb-afe12a0a4a25.name: Fighter Jock
e5b68a5c-0c04-4dd1-9deb-afe12a0a4a25.notes: Must take Piloting as primary skill and either Beam Weapons or Carousing as background.

5d0e4a24-71a4-471f-86cb-0666c714b856.name: Starship Captain
5d0e4a24-71a4-471f-86cb-0666c714b856.notes: Must take Navigation and Shiphandling as primary skills
